content: this pattern is available for free at https //www windingroadcrochet com/crochet-gnome-pattern-nurse-doctor/ or you can purchase the pdf pattern above to have a neat clean printer-friendly large font ad-free version of the pattern the pattern is written in english using us terms pattern level easy/intermediate this pattern uses the chain single_crochet decrease working in the front loop slip_stitch materials needed size 4 yarn size 3 3 5 mm crochet hook yarn needle and scissors polyfil this listing is for a pdf pattern instant download not a finished product please make sure to download adobe reader at www adobe com if you do not already have it on your computer copyright ©2019 winding road crochet purchaser is not allowed to copy sell or reproduce this pattern in any way because this is a digital product there will be no refunds after purchase
